short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cube members can use this extension to quickly save, share and organize resources they find on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cube For Teachers is a free education sharing network uniting educators globally. 

Educators can search, share and save to an ever-growing collection of teacher recommended resources.

Follow educators and filter resources shared globally and locally.

Collaboration is key. On Cube, educators share links to all things educational including lessons, activities, modern teaching strategies and tips, blogs, assessments, ways to integrate technologies, leadership resources, special education resources, indigenous resources, resources in all subjects, and all grades.

Extension Features:
    - Save links to resources to your Cube account quickly and efficiently.
    - Curate and organize your edu resource links into folders right from the extension.
    - Access shared Cube resources with the click of a button.
